title: Regional Digital-Content Roll-outs (Snapplify)
description: Implemented e-learning platforms and digitized curricula across four East-African countries, impacting 400+ schools.

title: User-Growth Campaign (eLimu)
description: Drove web users from 250k to 500k+ and tripled app downloads through targeted school activations and marketing partnerships.

title: Safaricom Mobile-Learning Expansion (Eneza)
description: Helped deliver SMS-based learning content to 6m+ learners, while transitioning from support to business-development role.
